commercial-use.label: Commercial use
commercial-use.description: The licensed material and derivatives may be used for commercial purposes.

modifications.label: Modification
modifications.description: The licensed material may be modified.

distribution.label: Distribution
distribution.description: The licensed material may be distributed.

private-use.label: Private use
private-use.description: The licensed material may be used and modified in private.

patent-use.label: Patent use
patent-use.description: This license provides an express grant of patent rights from contributors.

include-copyright.label: License and copyright notice
include-copyright.description: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the licensed material.

include-copyright--source.label: License and copyright notice for source
include-copyright--source.description: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the licensed material in source form, but is not required for binaries.

document-changes.label: State changes
document-changes.description: Changes made to the licensed material must be documented.

disclose-source.label: Disclose source
disclose-source.description: Source code must be made available when the licensed material is distributed.

network-use-disclose.label: Network use is distribution
network-use-disclose.description: Users who interact with the licensed material via network are given the right to receive a copy of the source code.

same-license.label: Same license
same-license.description: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.

same-license--file.label: Same license (file)
same-license--file.description: Modifications of existing files must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.

same-license--library.label: Same license (library)
same-license--library.description: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the licensed material. In some cases a similar or related license may be used, or this condition may not apply to works that use the licensed material as a library.

trademark-use.label: Trademark use
trademark-use.description: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant trademark rights, even though licenses without such a statement probably do not grant any implicit trademark rights.

liability.label: Liability
liability.description: This license includes a limitation of liability.

patent-use.label: Patent use
patent-use.description: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant any rights in the patents of contributors.

warranty.label: Warranty
warranty.description: This license explicitly states that it does NOT provide any warranty.
